[by:争争扎]
[ti:Not Afraid To Die]
[ar:Pain]
[al:Dancing With The Dead]
[by:争争扎]
[00:32.97]A journey through the space, colors, planets everywhere
[00:36.40]We're testing our
[00:36.93](In)
[00:37.33]Sanity
[00:40.47]A razor across our skins, dropping all these magic pills
[00:43.80]Can't you see we're floating away
[00:47.94]Come take my hand, we'll fly away
[00:53.07]We'll move in silence
[00:55.51]We'll take a trip inside our heads
[00:59.75]Frame by frame
[01:02.63]We're not afraid to die
[01:06.26]We're not afraid to lose our minds
[01:10.12]We're not afraid to face the things we left behind
[01:17.63]We're not afraid
[01:25.60]Can you feel the vibration now?
[01:27.25]Turn your body inside out
[01:28.99]This is really going to hurt
[01:32.68]Diving to the sea of hell
[01:34.57]Can you hear the judgment bells?
[01:36.51]It's ringing for you and I
[01:40.54]Hear how it's calling out our names
[01:45.18]You better drop another pill
[01:48.81]It will never be the same
[01:52.51]We're going down
[03:34.50][01:55.19]We're not afraid to die
[03:38.13][01:58.89]We're not afraid to lose our minds
[03:42.03][02:02.72]We're not afraid to face the things we left behind
[03:49.24][02:10.04]We're not afraid to cry
[03:53.39][02:13.85]We're not afraid to kiss the sky
[03:57.04][02:17.78]We're not afraid to face the things we left behind
[02:25.80]A constant replay of our lives is flashing before my eyes
[02:33.29]A silent movie in black and white
[02:49.20]Maybe it got too much too soon

[03:01.84]I think we're gonna crash
[03:10.40]we're gonna crash
